channel.title: Well 8th day now on row and this is what i come up with someone help please

item.title: Well 8th day now on row and this is what i come up with someone help please
item.dc:creator: @Coldmedicine Coldmedicine
item.description:
@Coldmedicine wrote:

Replace public void raredrops with:

[code] public boolean rareDrops(Client c, int i) {
int rarity = 0;
int ringOfWealth = 0;
int npcDropRate = ((Integer)NPCDrops.dropRarity.get(Integer.valueOf(npcs[i].npcType))).intValue();
if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerRing] == 2572 && npcDropRate-3 > 0) {
ringOfWealth = 1+Misc.random(2);
c.sendMessage(“Your ring of wealth helped your drop rate by @red@”+ringOfWealth+"@bla@%");
}
rarity = Misc.random(npcDropRate-ringOfWealth);

  return rarity == 0;

}[/code]

Find

Replace the inside with

if(this.rareDrops(c,i)) { random = Misc.random(((int[][])NPCDrops.rareDrops.get(Integer.valueOf(npcs[i].npcType))).length - 1); Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, ((int[][])NPCDrops.rareDrops.get(Integer.valueOf(npcs[i].npcType)))[random][0], npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY, ((int[][])NPCDrops.rareDrops.get(Integer.valueOf(npcs[i].npcType)))[random][1], c.playerId); if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerRing] == 2752) { c.sendMessage("@whi@Your ring of wealth glows brightly"); } if(c.clanId >= 0) { Server.clanChat.handleLootShare(c, ((int[][])NPCDrops.rareDrops.get(Integer.valueOf(npcs[i].npcType)))[random][0], ((int[][])NPCDrops.rareDrops.get(Integer.valueOf(npcs[i].npcType)))[random][1]); } }

public int ITEM_RARE = 50;

ring of wealth code
public boolean applyRingOfWealth() {
Client c = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[this.playerId];
if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerRing] == 2572) {
}
return ITEM_RARE == (50/50);

}

code doesnt work sick of trying to make one that does someone help me out here i need a working ring of wealth for 317 pi or help with my code
